content: {"name": "The Lord\u2019s Pantry St. John the Baptist Catholic Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Palisads school district area only ", "email": "", "url": "https://stjohnsottsville.org/food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4050 Durham Road", "address_2": "(Route 412) ", "city": "Ottsville", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "18942", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.4970843, "longitude": -75.1795032}, "phones": [{"number": "(610) 847-2402", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must be income-eligible"}]}
